chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Sammael, p. 31 (25)—One of the Forsaken. He took up residence on the Council of Nine in Illian as Lord Brend, and effectively rules the country. He bears a battle scar that he got while fighting Lews Therin Telamon during the War of the Shadow. He could have had it Healed, but kept it to remind himself of what Lews Therin had done to him. His name means “Destroyer of Hope” in the Old Tongue. See also Aellinsar, Tel Janin.
